details: Providing support as part of the Omicron response
Daily nowcasts of hospital admissions by date of postive test. Part of an international collaboration to provide improved estimates in real-time.
Weekly short-term COVID-19 forecasts of cases and admissions
Weekly short-term COVID-19 forecasts of deaths
Provided weekly estimates of the reproduction number; short-term forecasts; projections; and multiple ad-hoc reports
